text: @realDonaldTrump Americans are dying from the coronavirus at a rate over 100 an hour - yes, over 100 an hour. And what is Trump tweeting about? Calling Nancy Pelosi names.  Americans deserve far, far better than Trump and come January 20, 2021 we will have far better President.
